section.name: How To
section.p: This is just a little guide on how to install eFaps for development reasons.
section.subsection: Check the latest SourceCode out from the repository into a folder "efapsfolder" on your harddisk. (see also the project information about the source repository).
Go into the folder "efapsfolder" and run Maven using "mvn -install". Be sure to have a Connection to the Internet, because during the installation Maven will download all dependencys of eFaps.
For the conection of the kernel to the Database the Bootstrap must be defined as explained in the Database Section.
Create the Tables, View and so on in the Database by running the shell with create. (e.g. on Unix based Systems like: "./shell.sh - create"
